Usage [Cardinality]:
R
NOTE: Required - for Discharge events
V2 value set, other notes:
The code values to be used in PV1-36 should be from the NUBC UB-04 Patient Discharge Status codes used in Form Locator 17. (https://www.nubc.org/) - not included in Value Set Mapping tab;
Since the DaVinci IG inherited the example binding to the Valueset defined by FHIR core and USCore did not further constrain it implementers should use the same codes as they use in V2.
FHIR Value set, other notes:
http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-encounter-discharge-disposition.html
The FHIR value set is example binding, so can use same as in Direct IG

It would be nice to adopt the same vlaue set in Direct IG

V2 value set, other notes:
NOTE: The treating facility name SHOULD be distinctive enough that it uniquely identifies the physical location (facility) where the patient is or was being treated

NOTE: The Treating Facility Address should be sent in a corresponding ROL segment in ROL-11 with ROL-3 = TF        

NOTE: The Treating Facility Name should correspond with the Organization identified in the EVN-7 and whose address is sent in ROL-11, with ROL-3 = TF
Maybe constrain the DIrect IG to make PV2 at least RE
FHIR Value set, other notes: Address for this location can be sent in https://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3.1/StructureDefinition-us-core-location-definitions.html#Location.address

V2 value set, other notes:
